modName: No Ash Pile Lightning Storm and Raised Bodies
summary: In Vanilla Skyrim, killing an enemy with Lightning Storm leaves an ash pile REGARDLESS of whether you have the Disintegrate perk. This is really annoying because when you kill a dragon it will disintegrate making it almost impossible to find the dragon later to receive the soul and loot.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]Why Did I Make This Mod?[/u][/size][/color]
[size=3]All this mod does is remove the disintegrate from Lightning Storm, meaning it will only disintegrate enemies if you have the perk[/size][/b][size=3]. In Vanilla Skyrim, killing an enemy with Lightning Storm leaves an ash pile REGARDLESS of whether you have the Disintegrate perk. This is really annoying because those ash piles are really ugly, and most importantly: when you kill a dragon it will disintegrate making it almost impossible to find the dragon later to receive the soul and loot.Â [/size]

[size=3]I would highly recommend downloading this if you use destruction magic. Even if you're not, I would get it just in case you do.[/size][/font]
author: Gushis
